channel.title: Would you?
channel.description: If i were to make a runescape private server that had the same concept as frugooscape (don't say unrealscape because i'm about to tell you the difference), but incorporated all the newer things such as godsword stances, skillcape emotes, and pretty much all the 474 emotes. Do you think it would be a hit or no?

item.title: Would you?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:27, topic:365109”][quote author=whip of soulz link=topic=461312.msg3375697#msg3375697 date=1287602346]

[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=461312.msg3375692#msg3375692 date=1287601985]

Does anybody even play servers anymore? Or is it just me getting older…

I still play RS.

For reals? How has it changed over the months i havn’t been on in like 4 months.

PKing is gay now.

That honestly does not surprise me. What happened to it? Like no offense to Jagex, but how the hell could pking on runescape get any gayer! It makes me mad that they don’t realize that more people would play if old wildy was back.
[/quote]It makes me mad when people like you don’t realise that they took out the old wildy for a reason…

lol’d. What they attempted to prevent is still occurring.
[/quote]Maybe that’s why the wildy hasn’t come back yet. If people stopped maybe they would consider bringing it back.

Either way they’re losing so I don’t see your point.

If they did bring it back people would just rwt even more, you still have pking now if you dont like it play servers instead.

Nah, the numbers would be surprisingly similar.[/quote]
Jc wins just accept it

Read full topic

item.title: Would you?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:21, topic:365109”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=461312.msg3375010#msg3375010 date=1287532161]

Does anybody even play servers anymore? Or is it just me getting older…

I still play RS.

For reals? How has it changed over the months i havn’t been on in like 4 months.

PKing is gay now.

That honestly does not surprise me. What happened to it? Like no offense to Jagex, but how the hell could pking on runescape get any gayer! It makes me mad that they don’t realize that more people would play if old wildy was back.
[/quote]It makes me mad when people like you don’t realise that they took out the old wildy for a reason…[/quote]

RWT still happens, you’re correct they took it out for a reason which was to stop RWT, this measure failed therefore they should re-add it? If I’m wrong please feel free to correct me for I have not played runescape in a long time.

@Topic

I think it’d be a great idea, all you need to worry about is the potential target audience it’s no secret that most people would rather play an easy server over a more challenging one. I personally would go for the more challenging one.

Me, Si Force and some others had an idea off creating something similar but in a island type layout. If you could create something hardly anyone uses such as that then people with brain cells will investigate the content and notice this server is different.

Read full topic

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You are correct.
A lot of the people who play RSPS are tired of the modern items of what RuneScape has. The point of RSPS servers (some) was to bring back the old days in the first place.

item.title: Would you?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:10, topic:365109”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=461312.msg3374796#msg3374796 date=1287521036]
I agree with the older game frame and stuff, but i just remember how kool frugooscape was. that is what got me where i am today. If it wern’t for frugooscape i woulda never been involved with RSPS or moparscape and was thinking i could make a tribute server, but i guess it does sound kinda lame.
[/quote]

Then go for it mate. You can try, but Frugooscape released all the 474 items which kind of ruined the point of the classic part about it in my opinion.[/quote]

So your sayin it would be better like without godswords and skillcapes and stuff like that? I mean now that i think about it, that would seem kinda rare to see in a server these days.

Read full topic
